title: Home - Vitality Natural Health and Wellness Center
sitename: Vitality Natural Health and Wellness Center
cleaned_text: Natural Health and Wellness Center, the area's leading holistic wellness center with locations in Meadville, PA; Grove City, PA; and Lakewood, NY. Vitality Natural Health is made up of a dynamic team of holistic health professionals offering services in naturopathic medicine, nutritional therapy, health coaching, acupuncture, massage therapy, chiropractic care, reiki, Feldenkrais, whole body cryotherapy, infrared sauna, and ionic detox foot bath. Additionally, we offer a retail store at each location where we carry professional grade nutritional supplements, herbs, and homeopathic remedies; natural body care and wellness products; essential oils; full spectrum hemp products; locally made products; and natural foods. Our client-centered naturopathic functional medicine approach addresses the root causes of diseases and promotes optimal wellness. We provide our clients with the education and tools to optimize health through lifestyle-based interventions. We use the latest advancements in laboratory testing to uncover underlying dysfunctions and often overlooked factors that can have a significant impact on your health. With this objective data, along with a detailed analysis of the factors affecting your health, we tailor a customized plan with dietary recommendations and condition specific natural supplements - all to each person's unique physiology. We look forward to becoming a partner in your health journey! Supplement & Retail Store We carry professional grade supplements to meet all of your nutritional needs.
